hooks.prompt:
Before modifying skills/ or agents/ files, verify:
1. SKILL.md has required sections (Overview, Activation, Core Patterns, Best Practices, Anti-Patterns)
2. Agent files have required sections (Overview, Activation, Checklist, Report Format)
3. Code examples use TypeScript with good/bad patterns
4. README.md will need updating after this change

A skill or agent file was modified. Consider:
1. Running /validate-structure to check consistency
2. Updating README.md if new content was added
3. Updating plugin.json version for significant changes
